Uses of Package
rlu.foundation.exceptions

Packages that use rlu.foundation.exceptions
rlu.foundation.exceptions Contains useful classes for exception handling. 
rlu.foundation.gui Contains useful helper classes to build graphical user interfaces with Swing. 
rlu.foundation.persistence Contains useful classes for implementing persistence functionality. 
rlu.foundation.security Contains useful classes for implementing security functionality. 
rlu.sqltrainer.application Contains application classes which provide a user interface independent API for the SQLTrainer. 
rlu.sqltrainer.domain Covers aspects of domain objects, which are relevant for the SQL Trainer. 
rlu.sqltrainer.persistence Provides persistence functionality for the SQL Trainer. 
 

Classes in rlu.foundation.exceptions used by rlu.foundation.exceptions
ErrorHandler
          Abstract class which defines a standard interface for communicating errors and warnings to the user.
 

Classes in rlu.foundation.exceptions used by rlu.foundation.gui
ErrorHandler
          Abstract class which defines a standard interface for communicating errors and warnings to the user.
SimpleErrorHandler
          Simple text-based error handler which writes messages to the standard error stream.
 

Classes in rlu.foundation.exceptions used by rlu.foundation.persistence
PersistenceException
          Exception class, covering all kinds of exceptions which have to do with persistence.
 

Classes in rlu.foundation.exceptions used by rlu.foundation.security

          Exception class, covering all kinds of exceptions which have to do with encryption.
